import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LoginRequest } from '../models/login-request.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { model: LoginRequest; constructor() { this.model = { email: '', password: '', }; } onSubmitForm(): }
